name: Treasure Tiles
description:
How to play:

Cursed castles, remote ruins, dark caves... our world offers us scenarios as spectacular as mysterious! Put yourself in the shoes of two treasure hunters willing to do anything to unearth new riches. Invest your gemstones in great adventures,  but be careful! You could end up in a bad situation and lose everything you own. Or maybe you can find a treasure of inestimable value.

But at what cost?
